features: [Charming Breath RGB Backligh]:16 million color options for the backlight setting make your gaming mouse look cool.The RGB lights is more vibrant than basic light up mice.Turn it off when you unwanted.

[High-Precision DPI & Polling Rateh]:gaming mouse run flawlessly with optical sensor and avoids random clicks.adjust DPI 1200-7200,polling rate125-1000Hz to provide precise cursor movements for gameplay.
[Seven Programmable Buttons]:Mouse have 7 buttons,can set for more functions like rapid fire,macro etc.Software is initial setup.side buttons are default as forward,backward for efficiency surfing.

[Ergonomic Design,Less Fatigue]:The ergonomic contour makes gaming mice fit in any hands.Texture of mouse is a super-fine rubber that feels comfortable and less your fatigue during multiplayer sessions.

[Plug & Play, Build Quality]:As a plug-and-play wired mouse,easy to use and work with Windows,Mac OS,etc.You can feel the solid construction of all buttons.They are responsive,won’t squeak or get stuck.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WEEMSBOX RGB Gaming Mouse Looking for a gaming mouse that can deliver precision, customization, and style? Look no further than the WEEMSBOX RGB Gaming Mouse! Designed with precision and comfort in mind, the WEEMSBOX wired mouse features a sleek and ergonomic design that fits comfortably in your hand. The high-precision optical sensor provides accurate and responsive tracking, while the adjustable DPI settings allow you to customize the sensitivity to your liking.

Designed with gamers in mind, the WEEMSBOX gammer mouse is perfect for those looking for a high-performance gaming experience. With adjustable DPI settings ranging from 1200 to 7200, computer mouse can provide the perfect level of sensitivity for any gaming situation. And with a polling rate of up to 1000Hz, you can be sure that your RGB mouse movements will be registered with lightning-fast accuracy.Overall, the WEEMSBOX RGB Gaming Mouse is the perfect accessory for any serious gamer who wants to up their game. With precision, customization, and style, it's a must-have for anyone looking to dominate their opponents and take their gaming experience to the next level.

----------Charming LED Light---------- RGB lighting system: With 16 million programmable RGB lighting effects, the RGB mouse lets you personalize your gaming style to your liking. The RGB lighting system, coupled with the stylish design, adds a touch of glamour to your gaming setup. --------7 programmable buttons-------- With adjustable DPI and 7 programmable buttons, you can easily customize the gaming mouse to fit your specific gaming needs. Plus, with the ability to execute quick keyboard macros, you'll have the upper hand on your opponents. ------Meet Different Requirements----- You can switch the polling rate from 125Hz to 1000Hz according to your different operational needs.

But don't just take our word for it - check out what other users are saying. the WEEMSBOX gaming mouse is a customer favorite. Users rave about the precision and responsiveness of the sensor, as well as the comfortable grip and customizable features,with one even saying it's the "best mouse I've ever owned."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A tough, high quality gaming mouse at an affordable price!
reviews.reviewText: After being very disappointed by high priced, brand name gaming mice over the years, I started using this mouse several years ago - and it's worked better than pretty much all of the really expensive ones! I use it for heavy duty gaming and have only had one failure in over 5 years, where one of the main buttons eventually got stuck. Now I keep a few of these in my spare parts drawer, so that i always have one on hand when ever anyone in the family needs to replace any of their mice too. This mouse has good feel, excellent responsiveness, can take thousands of clicks with no problem, and is a joy to use. Highly recommended, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this purchase!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Lizsword Wired Gaming Mouse for my gaming setup, and I have to say, I am extremely impressed with its performance. The mouse features high-precision adjustable 7200 DPI, which delivers lightning-fast response times and smooth, precise movements. It's also incredibly customizable, with 7 programmable buttons that can be programmed to execute complex macros and perform a wide range of functions.One of the standout features of the Lizsword Wired Gaming Mouse is its breathing RGB LED lighting. The lighting adds a nice touch of style to my gaming setup, and it's incredibly customizable, with a range of different colors and lighting effects to choose from.The mouse's ergonomic design is also worth noting. It's incredibly comfortable to use, even for extended gaming sessions, and the textured side grips provide a firm, secure grip. The plug-and-play design makes it incredibly easy to set up, and the mouse is compatible with a wide range of operating systems, including Windows, PC, Mac, and laptop.Overall, I would highly recommend the Lizsword Wired Gaming Mouse to any gamer looking for a high-performance, customizable gaming mouse that performs exceptionally well. Its fast response times, customizable buttons, and comfortable design make it an excellent choice for both casual and competitive gamers alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a cool mouse, works well, does the job. We thought this would be more of a Cyan color as pictured to go with the rest of my sons gaming set up, but it is more of a deep blue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great extra mouse for my laptop
reviews.reviewText: Does the job on the go for my laptop. Cool breathing rbg effect. No problems with the item , has programmable buttons for games. Great price to quality ratio. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this same brand but a different model mouse (they discontinued) that lasted me 3/4 years before it started having issues. Tried this one and love the feel, its exactly what I had but better. Btw the driver website to download is in the manual and its a Chinese Domain. Haha...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The right mous for almost all tasks
reviews.reviewText: I had this mouse for years, and I recently purchased another one for another PC. It works very well, and you don't have to worry about batteries or connectivity issues, or losing that small usb for wireless mouse.It's a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not ergonomic, noisy
reviews.reviewText: The mouse buttons cannot be programed without going to a sketchy website. This is not ergonomic but functions as a mouse pretty well. Clicks are loud.
Didn’t receive the same mouse in the picture but it is very nice & the way it fits my hand is better than expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mouse, but not the one I ordered / not the product shown
reviews.reviewText: The product shown is a great mouse. I have bought 3 so far for my friends and I. I love it.But, the mouse I was sent with my latest order is a slightly different design with an extra button, rubber thumb grip, and side "flaps" which bother my pinky a bit, but isn't terrible. I'm torn as to whether or not I should return it or keep it, as the mouse I received IS still pretty decent and similar, but I do love the actual product shown.

reviews.reviewTitle: The side mouse button could only be binded to one
reviews.reviewText: It couldn’t be binded as two only as one but overall the design it pretty good it’s comfortable
I've been using this mouse for years, and it's worked fine, but its buttons just stopped working, and even with this replacement I haven't been able to get any of the key settings to work.
